snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes a way to put Instagram photos on Twitter once more, Zynga trying to find a way for people to bet real money on...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes a way to put Instagram photos on Twitter once more, Zynga trying to find a way for people to bet real money on its games and a judge rules that certain things must be removed froma Yelp post.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Zynga's Betting Plan, and Court Ruling on Yelp Complaint
